name: Cargo Stunt Plane
description:
Controls

Just move mouse to steer plane (mouse follow) I did this to to simulate a touch on a device.

How to play

Flags are missions, one flag at a time is best, they are also replayable!

watch out for items with black outlines, planes ect.

WOW! there's 4 missions: deliver boxes, collect coins, collect medals and a time trial.

I have the current record for collect coins is 67, let me know if you beat it!

SpideY has the current record for time trial is 58 seconds, let me know if you beat it!

Programmers notes

Over all I'm very happy with this game, it looks awesome due to some great CCO graphics from https://opengameart.org/ and some cool positive music. the controls and programming isn't bad either, although the code could be cleaner with more time... but it is a jam after all...

there are some issues with the missions, if you die when time runs out or as the reappear the mission might be started again, and the medals one finishes too early, maybe not enough time now to solve...

Made with Godot
